original_text: So they gave to Jacob all the foreign gods that they had, and the rings that were in their ears. Jacob hid them under the terebinth tree that was near Shechem.
korean_text: 그들이 자기 손에 있는 모든 이방 신상들과 자기 귀에 있는 귀고리들을 야곱에게 주는지라 야곱이 그것들을 세겜 근처 상수리나무 아래에 묻고

sentences.original_text: So they gave to Jacob all the foreign gods
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 야곱에게 자신들이 가진 모든 이방 신들을 주었고

sentences.original_text: and the rings that were in their ears
Jacob hid them under the terebinth tree
